items.name: EC KPI Data Valhall
items.extendedDescription: High level production numbers for energy components.
items.qualityAssessment:
Old db-extract.
Lacks metadata.
Naming of the time series need be changed.
Most likely running on old DB connections, as EC changed these recently.
items.sourceConnectionDetails:
Username: COGNITE_PROD_VALHALL
Hostname: a21-ex1-scan-prod-ha.pertra.locale
Port: 1521
Service Name: ECVALH1P
Connection String: "DRIVER={NameOfDriver};DBQ=a21-ex1-scan-prod-ha.pertra.locale:1521/ECVALH1P;UID=COGNITE_PROD_VALHALL;PWD=LASTPASS"
